short_summary: Four (4) Intermediate Special Advisor. Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).
full_summary:
# 2023 Government Tender Announcement
## Temporary Help Services Requirement
### Contract Information

* **Contract Reference Number**: S4394525
* **Contract Name**: Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-03
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-18T16:00:00 (expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* **Procurement Category**: SRV

### Supplier Information
The solicitation is opened only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the **Special Advisor** stream and category.

The following selection of suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Adirondack Information Management Inc.
* Akkada Professional Services Inc.
* Alivaktuk Consulting Inc. & NavPoint Consulting Group Inc. in Joint Venture
* Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
* Dare Human Resources Corporation
* Excel Human Resources Inc.
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* Modis Canada Inc
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, in Joint Venture
* Ombre Consulting Services Incorporated
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* T.I.7 Inc.
* The AIM Group Inc.
* Turtle Island Staffing Inc.
* Valencia IIP Advisors Limited

### Description of Requirement

The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).

The proposed offeror must be able to provide the following services:

* Temporary staff support to aid DND in their day-to-day operations
* Resource(s) with a minimum security level of **Reliability**

The successful supplier shall have a compliance framework in place to ensure that security classification and clearances are met or exceeded.

### Contact Information

* CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613971-7955

### Notice and Attachment

Public tender notice can be viewed [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5212/s4394525-rfp_
